Package it.polimi.adaptanalyzertool.model

Class ComponentGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.adaptanalyzertool.model.ComponentGroup
  • public class ComponentGroup
extends java.lang.Object

    This class represents a group that contains all the components that provide and require the same services.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ComponentGroup​(java.lang.String name)
      Creates an empty ComponentGroup.

      Adds a component to this group.

      Adds a group that is required by this group.

      java.util.Set<ComponentGroup> getRequiredGroups()  
      java.util.Set<RequiredService> getRequiredServices()  
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getRequiredServicesNames()  
      void removeComponent​(Component component)
      Removes a component from this group and returns it; if no component is removed null is returned instead.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        the name of this group.

      • getComponents

        public java.util.Set<Component> getComponents()
        Returns:
        a Set of the component in this group, possibly empty.

      • addComponent

        public void addComponent​(Component component)

        Adds a component to this group.

        Note that if a wrong component is added, i.e. a component with different Required or Provided Service, this method throws an IllegalArgumentException.

        Parameters:
        component - the component to be added.

      • removeComponent

        public void removeComponent​(Component component)

        Removes a component from this group and returns it; if no component is removed null is returned instead.

        Parameters:
        component - the component to be removed.

      • getProvidedServices

        public java.util.Set<ProvidedService> getProvidedServices()
        Returns:
        a HashSet containing all the Provided Services of this group.

      • getProvidedServicesNames

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getProvidedServicesNames()
        Returns:
        a Set containing all the names of the Provided Services of this group.

      • getRequiredServicesNames

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getRequiredServicesNames()
        Returns:
        a Set containing all the names of the Required Services of this group.

      • getRequiredServices

        public java.util.Set<RequiredService> getRequiredServices()
        Returns:
        a Set containing all the Required Services of this group.

      • addRequiredGroup

        public void addRequiredGroup​(ComponentGroup componentGroup)

        Adds a group that is required by this group.

        Parameters:
        componentGroup - the group required by this group.

      • getRequiredGroups

        public java.util.Set<ComponentGroup> getRequiredGroups()
        Returns:
        a Set containing the groups required by this one.
